channel.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
channel.description:
[code]starting... src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \187 ´╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content.TriviaBot; ^ src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \191 ´╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content.TriviaBot; ^ src\com\rs\game\World.java:54: error: cannot access TriviaBot import com.rs.game.player.content.TriviaBot; ^ bad source file: src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java file does not contain class com.rs.game.player.content.TriviaBot Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the sou rcepath. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
All I need now is to fix this error, can anyone help me?

item.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

I can list a few common matrix commands which you can try in-game.

::giveadmin
::givemod
::donator
::jail
::kick
::mute
::tonpc
::npc
::staffmeeting
::hide
::ban
::ipban

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“newb321, post:8, topic:455481”]got skype? for the background. and the char rights are by a command “admin” in the commands .java there are names after it, just change it to ur ing name, and type::admin, then relog[/quote]I got Skype, maybe you would like to pm me your username?

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
item.dc:creator: @newb321 newb321
item.description:
@newb321 wrote:

got skype? for the background. and the char rights are by a command “admin” in the commands .java there are names after it, just change it to ur ing name, and type::admin, then relog

item.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“ultimateGodz, post:4, topic:455481”]Go to your character files and put set rigths to what ever owner is set to.[/quote][quote=“Exos, post:6, topic:455481”]Hello, the owner is in player.java aswell as admin, mod ect, but if you can’t find it, use this code in player.java

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("UserName")) { rights = 2; }[/quote]
Thanks for all the trouble you guys went through, but neither of these suggestions helped me out

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
item.dc:creator: @Exos Exos
item.description:
@Exos wrote:

Hello, the owner is in player.java aswell as admin, mod ect, but if you can’t find it, use this code in player.java

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("UserName")) { rights = 2; }

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

Thanks a lot I appreciate the time you took to reply, but Ive tried the majority of things you have stated, and not much of it worked, the admin part didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: [Matrix 718] Several Questions [New]
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

To make yourself (and others) staff (all i know is owner) search the name of Matrix owner. like dragon kk or who ever owned it. it should be in player.java, or commands.java, then change his name to yours. And the client background can be changed in the sprites. located in “C:/Program Files or (x86)/ Matrix cache/ Sprites” There you can change like the owner crown, background, frames, etc. And as far as the donating aura goes I really have no idea sorry, I was trying to figure that out myself.

Read full topic
